    Hi. This blog is an experiment in getting away from social media sites and managing my own content. Until I learn more about Jekyll, this site is going to be a bit of a mess. Bear with me and you may be rewarded with thrilling stories of the stuff I make at Decatur Makers, a family-friendly makerspace in downtown Decatur, GA.
